item.description:
Living Root Dragon Boat (http://www.livingroot...) seeks athletic men and women for dragon boat racing! Opportunities to race in Boston, Montreal, New York, Pawtucket, Hartford and San Francisco available!

No prior experience necessary. Athleticism, good overall fitness, and/or prior triathlon, swimming, basketball, cycling, marathon, volleyball, rugby, field hockey, lacrosse, football, soccer, running, crew, rowing, sculling, paddling, canoeing, white water rafting, outrigger, kayaking, water polo, or yoga experience a plus.

Schedule a free trial practice today! Visit www.livingroot.org.

What is the Living Root Dragon Boat difference? Consistently achieving results, focus, positive attitude, challenging training, experienced coaching staff. When you want to compete with the best of the best, you have to be at your best and work as a team.
item.name: New To Boston? Start Boston Dragon Boat Racing With Living Root Dragon Boat
